info.description: API to retrieve the details of  Basic and Periodic Interest Rates, history of interest rate changes and base rate identifiers and associated descriptions available in the system.
info.title: Interest Rates

get.description: Retrieves descriptions of the interest conditions

parameters.name: rateTextId
parameters.description: The basic interest rate ID / name.

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

get.description: Retrieves Interest rate and negative interest rate. Input rate Id format example - 1USD20001025; 1USD20101025

parameters.name: rateId
parameters.description: Identifies the periodic or floating interest rates

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

post.description: Creates basic interest rate record. Input rate Id format example - 1USD20001025; 1USD20101025

parameters.name: rateId
parameters.description: Identifies the periodic or floating interest rates

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

put.description: Updates Interest rate and negative interest rate. Input rate Id format example - 1USD20001025; 1USD20101025

parameters.name: rateId
parameters.description: Identifies the periodic or floating interest rates

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

total_size.description: The total number of records present

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

interestRate.description: Identifies the bid rate of the related currency for the defined time period

negativeInterestRate.description: Contains the negative rate of interest that can be used for a contract

code.description: The code related to override message.

options.description: The usable options for the override.

effectiveDate.description: The date on which the principal movement is effected

floatingRates.description: The interest rate is chosen from a selection of values which represent different interest types and rates.

floatingRate.description: The interest rate is chosen from a selection of values which represent different interest types and rates.

effectiveDate.description: The date on which the principal movement is effected

oldRate.description: Contains the old rate which was used before effective date

rateNames.description: Specifies the name displayed for the interest rates

rateName.description: Specifies the name displayed for the interest rates

period.description: Indicates spread of time buckets.Ex: 3M,6M,9M,10Y etc.

rateDate.description: Specifies the date till which given rates are applicable

daysSinceStart.description: Specifies the number of days from the effective or value date of the contract

bandAmount.description: Specifies the amount of the band till which given rates are applicable

bidRate.description: Identifies the BID rate of the related currency for the time period

offerRate.description: Identifies the OFFER rate of the related currency for the time period

spreadCalcuationRoutines.description: Specifies the name of the routine to be used for customised spread calculation.

spreadCalcuationRoutine.description: Specifies the name of the routine to be used for customised spread calculation.

negativeRateApplicationId.description: Specifies that negative interest rates can be accessed in the application given in this field

historyCompanyId.description: Specifies the ID of the company through which record is modified

historyDate.description: Specifies the date when the record is modified

historyNumber.description: Specifies the previous version number of the modified record

defaultMisRateId.description: Identifies the default Management Information System (M.I.S.) rate to be used for the transaction.

buildForwardRate.description: Indicates whether the Forward rate of a currency should be calculated automatically or not

tolerancePercentage.description: Indicates the tolerance interest percentage cap that can be applied on a contract

maximumInterestRate.description: Indicates the largest possible interest rate applicable for the currency

useLastWorkingDay.description: Specifies when set to Y, that the Rest date will be derived as a working day if the actual date falls on an holiday

riskFreeRate.description: Indicates the rate of return on an investment with zero risk

receivedDate.description: Identifies the date on which the document was received

periodicInterestId.description: Contains the id of the rate of interest assessed on a loan or investment over a set time period when compounding occurs more than once per year
